main event: A UFO was observed in Roseville, California on January 12, 1957.
interesting points: The object was described as oblong in shape, about three times the size of a basketball held at arm's length.
The object changed color from basic silver-white to pale orange and back to basic.
The object was unusually large in comparison to the surrounding stars and emitted enough light to cast a shadow reflection on the observer's parked car.
The object's movement alternated between a circular pattern and a zig-zag course, with changes in speed from slow to stop.
Multiple observers, including a civilian student, reported the sighting, which lasted for approximately 6 minutes.
sighted object: an oblong, silver-white to pale orange object
